examples.example: 我每天都会阅读报纸来了解最新的资讯。

translate.english: I read newspapers every day to learn about the latest information.

examples.example: 爷爷每天都会坐在阳台上安静地看报纸。

translate.english: Grandfather sits on the balcony and reads the newspaper quietly every day.

examples.example: 我喜欢在闲暇时翻阅报纸，感受丰富多彩的世界。

translate.english: I like to read newspapers in my spare time and feel the colorful world.
